ActJudges Act
SubjectNational Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program ** Leave **
PrecisOrder approving a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to four judges from September 1, 2021 to April 30, 2022 to participate in the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program.
